name: Charleston Lake Provincial Park
review: We had such a great time on the lake! The staff was polite, kind and a lot of fun!  We enjoyed the programs in the park. And, it wasn't too far to go into Kingston. We did the 1000 islands Dinner Cruise. We rarely go back to the same place, but we will be going back to Charleston Lake!!!!!

name: Charleston Lake Provincial Park
review: Awesome park and great family camping. Great place to camp, kayak, hike and fish. Great for family.

name: Charleston Lake Provincial Park

name: Charleston Lake Provincial Park
review: Been coming here 35+ years, great during the summer but rediscovered it in the fall season. make sure you reserve very very early for premium sites. clean beaches, good trails, lots to explore.

name: Charleston Lake Provincial Park

name: Charleston Lake Provincial Park
review: Camp is well maintained clean and has a variety of activities.  Several trails for hiking . Some with wheelchair accessible areas. Several very nice private campsites.

review: Great hiking trails.   And sites with real grass.  Wow!

name: Charleston Lake Provincial Park
review: Nice clean campsites. Lots of RVs. The park office offers boat rentals for under $25 for the day which is a great way to explore some of the lake. Bring watershoes as there are zebra mussels throughout the lake and along the shore.
